dict.acceptation: 放弃，抛弃；离弃，丢弃；使屈从；停止进行，终止；
放任，放纵；完全屈从于压制；

sent.orig: The capitain captain ordered passengers and crew to abandon abandon ship about an hour later.
sent.trans: 船长在一个小时候命令乘客和船员弃船。

sent.orig: But exceeding desire is not happy, however ego abandon, abandon oneself to vice.
sent.trans: 但过度的欲望不是幸福，而是自我放纵，自甘堕落。

sent.orig: You may choose to abandon, but you can't abandon to choose.
sent.trans: 你可以选择放弃，但不可放弃选择。

sent.orig: I, Li Meng vowed to abandon all. Can not abandon you!
sent.trans: 我'李萌发誓抛弃一切。也不能抛弃你们！

sent.orig: Abandon a cold machine. After six spins, the machine has paid out very little, abandon it.
sent.trans: 任何机器如若连续六次不出回报，放弃它﹗另寻一台，以免深陷。
